title: Aural set, wind band - repeated motive

content.description: You will hear an excerpt from a work for wind band. The excerpt will be played three times. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: The opening four-note motive is repeated immediately at which interval?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
